TITLE: AI-Assisted Curriculum Updates
DEF: Using generative AI to critique curricula and propose updates
TASK: The AI-Assisted Curriculum Updates pattern deploys AI to review existing curricula, suggest updates and improvements to keep them current and engaging. The AI's ability to process large quantities of data quickly enables a comprehensive review and the provision of creative suggestions. However, the risk of overemphasis on quantitative metrics or inadvertently downplaying essential but not-easily-measurable aspects of education exists. Balancing AI recommendations with expert judgment and learner feedback is critical for effective use of this pattern.
